title: Niall Horan announces he's headed Down Under as fans speculate he will perform at the ARIA Awards
text:
Former One Direction star Niall Horan has announced he's headed Down Under.

The 26-year-old Irish singer took to his Facebook on Saturday to let fans know that he will be returning to Australia later this year.

'Aussie, Aussie, Aussie! My second home! You know how much I love you and miss you. I can't wait to come back and see you guys towards the end of the year,' he said.

'Until then my new single Nice To Meet You is out and I hope you enjoy it, and see you soon,' he added.

Fans were quick to speculate that the Slow Hands hit-maker will be performing at the ARIA Awards, which will take place in Sydney on November 27.

One fan commented: 'OMG yes! I hope so! I would so fly to Sydney for the ARIAS.'

'I can't wait to come back!' Niall Horan revealed on Saturday that he is heading Down Under - just in time for the ARIA Awards

Speculation: Fans were quick to speculate that Niall will be performing at the ARIA Awards, which will take place in Sydney on November 27

Another added: 'I have always wanted to go to the ARIAS.'

It wouldn't be the Slow Hands hit-maker's first time at the ARIAS.

Back in 2014, the hunk attended the exclusive event alongside his former One Direction bandmates.

Back again? It wouldn't be the Slow Hands hit-maker's first time at the ARIAS, having attended the event in 2014 with his former boyband One Direction

Sweet Creature: Harry Styles surprised Australians with a solo visit at the 2017 Awards ceremony after picking up an ARIA for Best International Artist (pictured)

Niall's fellow One Direction crooner Harry Styles also surprised Australians by attending the ARIA Awards in 2017.

While ARIA Awards representatives haven't commented whether Niall will attend this year's evet, it has been confirmed that 'some very major international guests' will be in attendance.

Earlier this week, Niall released his music video clip for his new single Nice to Meet Ya, starring 24-year-old Australian model Georgia Gibbs.
description: Former One Direction star Niall Horan has announced he's headed Down Under.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
